Summary: out a window I saw a red light travel quickly from low to high and gone.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Paw Paw
There were no other sightings in Paw Paw on or around January 15th 2008
divs: sighting detailsi had just gotten up, i walked to look out a window to see how much snow we had gotten the night before. i noticed a red light low in the sky behind a tree line. as soon as i registed that i was seeing something very different it took off at a diagonal in about 1 1\2 sec. up and out of sight. i looked around the room for anything that could have caused a reflection, the alarm clock had red lights, but there is no way it was the cause. i think back and i know i could see the glow through the trees. whatever i saw i know it was not comming from inside reflecting. i'm not saying it was a space ship, but it was something! i've seen many meteor showers and never saw one go from that low up.
